body_html:
I'm closing this issue for now. For future reference:
There is a script that takes care of the pip wheel renaming automatically:

E.g.,
tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_build.sh CPU tensorflow/tools/ci_build/builds/pip.sh CPU
tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_build.sh GPU tensorflow/tools/ci_build/builds/pip.sh GPU

For more details see:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build

body:
I'm closing this issue for now. For future reference:
There is a script that takes care of the pip wheel renaming automatically:

E.g.,
tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_build.sh CPU tensorflow/tools/ci_build/builds/pip.sh CPU
tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_build.sh GPU tensorflow/tools/ci_build/builds/pip.sh GPU

For more details see:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build
